desc.zh-CN: 详细用法参考如下示例
desc.en-US: For details, see the following example.

desc.zh-CN: 通过 type 设置不同的类型。可选值：success、warning、info、error，默认值：success 。
desc.en-US: Set different types through type. The options are success, warning, info, and error. The default value is success.

desc.zh-CN: 通过 size 属性设置不同的尺寸，可选值：nomal、large，默认值：nomal 。
desc.en-US: Set different sizes through the size attribute. The options are nomal and large. The default value is nomal.

desc.zh-CN: 当 size 为 large 时显示标题，可设置 title 或 slot 自定义标题。默认标题根据设置的 type 显示。
desc.en-US: When size is set to large, the title is displayed. You can set title or slot to customize the title. The default title is displayed according to the set type.

desc.zh-CN: 通过 center 属性可使文字显示居中。
desc.en-US: You can use the center property to center the text.

properties.name: closable
properties.defaultValue: 该属性的默认值为 true

desc.zh-CN: 设置警告是否可以关闭
desc.en-US: Set whether alarms can be disabled.

desc.zh-CN: 设置警告的图标，默认会根据 type 值自动使用对应图标
desc.en-US: Set the alarm icon. By default, the corresponding icon is automatically used based on the value of type.

properties.name: size
properties.defaultValue: 该属性的默认值为 normal

desc.zh-CN: 设置警告的大小 nomal/large， 缺省为 nomal。;该属性的可选值为 nomal / large
desc.en-US: Set the warning size to nomal or large. The default value is nomal. ;The value of this attribute can be nomal or large

desc.zh-CN: 设置警告的标题，在 size 为 large 时有效，默认根据 type 自动设置
desc.en-US: Set the warning title. This parameter is valid only when size is set to large. By default, the alarm title is automatically set based on type.

properties.name: type
properties.defaultValue: 该属性的默认值为 success

desc.zh-CN: 设置警告的类型;该属性的可选值为 success/warning/info/error
desc.en-US: Set the alarm type. The value of this attribute can be success / warning / info / error

desc.zh-CN: 设置警告的提示内容，默认为空;
desc.en-US: Set the warning prompt content. The default value is null.

properties.name: center
properties.defaultValue: 该属性的默认值为 false

desc.en-US: Customized text of the close button

properties.name: show-icon
properties.defaultValue: 该属性的默认值为 true

desc.zh-CN: 关闭 alert 时触发的事件
desc.en-US: Event triggered when the alert function is disabled

desc.zh-CN: 自定义关闭按钮，当 closable 属性为 false 时有效
